line_1: Each Temple with new weight of idols nods,
line_2: And borrow'd Altars smoke to other Gods.

line_1: The simper subsided, for she with her nods,
line_2: Awes these lower assemblies, as Jove awes the gods.

line_1: When from his Throne the Cloud-Compeller nods,
line_2: 'Twas thus th' Armipotent advis'd the Gods,

line_1: There, where the cross in hoary ruin nods,
line_2: While midnight silence wraps these drear abodes,

line_1: No more the Despot view, whose mighty nods
line_2: Shook nature, and proclaim'd him God of Gods;
Where Sleep and Silence guard the soft abodes,
